name: Capital Ring link to Greenford station

ai.summary: A very short, easy segment of the Capital Ring near Greenford station in London. At about 0.3 km, this urban stroll is beginner-friendly and offers a quick snapshot of the Capital Ring without a long commitment.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly urban pavements and sidewalks, with possible short sections along roads and through nearby green spaces. Expect level pathways and typical street crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Walk on designated pavements, be mindful of traffic when crossing roads, and keep an eye on weather and footing. Carry a charged phone and a light layer if conditions change.
